hours_text:
#### 

#### How to Find Us

The Lynda Fairly Carpinteria Arts Center is located at 865 Linden Avenue in Carpinteria, CA. From the 101 coming from the north, take the Linden Avenue exit and turn right towards the ocean. From the 101 coming from the south, take the Casitas Pass Rd. exit and turn left. Next, turn right on Carpinteria Avenue, and then left on Linden Avenue. The Charles Lo Bue Gallery is on the right side of Linden in the second block from the Carpinteria and Linden Avenue's intersection, right across from Smart & Final.

If you are coming to The Lynda Fairly Carpinteria Arts Center, our Board members strongly urge you to walk, ride a bike, carpool or use public transportation. Santa Barbara MTD bus #20 and bus #21 service Carpinteria. Here is a link to their schedules: [**Bus Schedule**](https://sbmtd.gov/routes/route-20/).

#### 

#### Charles Lo Bue Gallery Hours

Thursday: Noon - 4 p.m.  
Friday: Noon - 4 p.m.  
Saturday: Noon - 4 p.m.  
Sunday: Noon - 4 p.m.

Monday: Noon - 4 p.m.

From Santa Claus Lane to Carpinteria Creek Park, Carpinteria has a variety of galleries, artist boutiques, public murals and sculptures, and shops that display local artwork. [CLICK HERE](https://cdn.givecloud.co/s/files/1/0000/0820/files/2020-artintown.pdf "Art in Town Brochure pdf") to download our Art in Town brochure!

See the 2019 Public Art Tour with artist and volunteer John Wullbrandt below:**  
**

[](https://cdn.givecloud.co/s/files/1/0000/0820/files/2020-artintown.pdf)

collections_text:
### 

### 

### **Creating a vibrant community through the Arts**

### _Your community arts & events center_ __

Jan 8, 2026

####  Classic Rincon Exhibit Reception 

Join us for the unveiling of the new exhibit, Classic Rincon, at the Lynda Fairly Carpinteria Arts Center in our Charles Lo Bue gallery on Saturday, January 17th, from 4:00 to 6:00 PM. Discover inspiring works, fresh perspectives, and creative expression in a welcoming gallery setting. All are welcome—come explore, connect, and enjoy the art. 

[ Read More __](https://carpinteriaartscenter.org/gallery-new-show)

####  Spring Classes & Workshoops 

Spring 2026 Classes are now available for registration. Dive in and try something new! 

[ Read More __](https://carpinteriaartscenter.org/classesandworkshops)
